verses.verse: Observe <S%H8104><s%> the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib <S%H24><s%>, and keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>; for in the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib <S%H24><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> brought thee forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>.

And thou shalt sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, of the flock <S%H6629><s%> and the herd <S%H1241><s%>, in the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>, to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell there <S%H7931><s%>.

Thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> no leavened bread <S%H2557><s%> with it <S%H7651><s%>; seven days <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> therewith <S%H3899><s%>, even the bread of affliction <S%H6040><s%>; for thou camest forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in haste <S%H2649><s%>: that thou mayest remember <S%H2142><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> when thou camest forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy life <S%H2416><s%>.

And there shall be <S%H7200><s%> no leaven seen <S%H7200><s%> with thee in all thy borders <S%H1366><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; neither shall any of the flesh <S%H1320><s%>, which thou sacrificest <S%H2076><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>, remain <S%H3885><s%> all night until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

Thou mayest <S%H3201><s%> not sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> within any <S%H259><s%> of thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth thee <S%H5414><s%>;

but at the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>, to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell in <S%H2076><s%>, there thou shalt sacrifice the passover <S%H6453><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>, at the going down <S%H935><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%>, at the season <S%H4150><s%> that thou camest forth <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And thou shalt roast <S%H1310><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> it in the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>: and thou shalt turn <S%H6437><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and go <S%H1980><s%> unto thy tents <S%H168><s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>; and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a solemn assembly <S%H6116><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>; thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> no work therein <S%H4399><s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> shalt thou number <S%H5608><s%> unto thee <S%H2490><s%>: from the time thou beginnest to put the sickle <S%H2770><s%> to the standing grain <S%H7054><s%> shalt thou begin <S%H2490><s%> to number <S%H5608><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%>.

And thou shalt keep <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks <S%H7620><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with a tribute <S%H4530><s%> of a freewill-offering <S%H5071><s%> of thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, which thou shalt give <S%H5414><s%>, according as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> blesseth thee <S%H1288><s%>:

and thou shalt rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, thou <S%H1121><s%>, and thy son, and thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and thy man-servant <S%H5650><s%>, and thy maid-servant <S%H519><s%>, and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that is within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, and the sojourner <S%H1616><s%>, and the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and the widow <S%H490><s%>, that are in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee <S%H4725><s%>, in the place which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>, to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell there <S%H7931><s%>.
And thou shalt remember <S%H2142><s%> that thou wast a bondman <S%H5650><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and thou shalt observe <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> these statutes <S%H2706><s%>.

Thou shalt keep <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, after that thou hast gathered <S%H622><s%> in from thy threshing-floor <S%H1637><s%> and from thy winepress <S%H3342><s%>:

and thou shalt rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in thy feast <S%H2282><s%>, thou <S%H1121><s%>, and thy son, and thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and thy man-servant <S%H5650><s%>, and thy maid-servant <S%H519><s%>, and the Levite <S%H3881><s%>, and the sojourner <S%H1616><s%>, and the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and the widow <S%H490><s%>, that are within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou keep a feast <S%H2287><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>; because Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> thee in all thine increase <S%H8393><s%>, and in all the work <S%H4639><s%> of thy hands <S%H3027><s%>, and thou shalt be altogether joyful <S%H8056><s%>.

Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> in a year <S%H8141><s%> shall all thy males <S%H2138><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which he shall choose <S%H977><s%>: in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>, and in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks <S%H7620><s%>, and in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%>; and they shall not appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> empty <S%H7387><s%>:
every man <S%H376><s%> shall give as he is able <S%H4979><s%>, according to the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> which he hath given thee <S%H5414><s%>.

70 <S%H8199><s%> and officers <S%H7860><s%> shalt thou make <S%H5414><s%> thee in all thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H7626><s%>, according to thy tribes; and they shall judge <S%H8199><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with righteous <S%H6664><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>.

Thou shalt not wrest <S%H5186><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%>: thou shalt not respect <S%H5234><s%> persons <S%H6440><s%>; neither shalt thou take <S%H3947><s%> a bribe <S%H7810><s%>; for a bribe <S%H7810><s%> doth blind <S%H5786><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%>, and pervert <S%H5557><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.

That which is altogether <S%H6664><s%> just <S%H6664><s%> shalt thou follow <S%H7291><s%>, that thou mayest live <S%H2421><s%>, and inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth thee <S%H5414><s%>.

Thou shalt not plant <S%H5193><s%> thee an Asherah <S%H842><s%> of any kind of tree <S%H6086><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, which thou shalt make thee <S%H6213><s%>.
Neither shalt thou set thee up <S%H6965><s%> a pillar <S%H4676><s%>; which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hateth <S%H8130><s%>.
